author: Redacci√≥n El Pa√≠s
title: Tuberculosis en Cali: Secretar√≠a de Salud revel√≥ si hay brote en estaci√≥n de polic√≠a La Sultana
text:
Cali
Tuberculosis en Cali: Secretar√≠a de Salud revel√≥ si hay brote en estaci√≥n de polic√≠a La Sultana
Desde la Personer√≠a de la ciudad hab√≠an advertido sobre un posible brote de esta enfermedad que pod√≠a poner en riesgo la salud de los reclusos y hasta de los uniformados.
[Por: Redacci√≥n El Pa√≠s](/autor/redaccion-el-pais/)
Ante la preocupaci√≥n que ha generado un supuesto brote de tuberculosis en la estaci√≥n de polic√≠a La Sultana, la Secretar√≠a de Salud de Cali se pronunci√≥. Desde la entidad afirmaron que, hasta la fecha, no se ha registrado un inusual n√∫mero de reportes por esta enfermedad.
Carlos Eduardo Pinz√≥n, subsecretario de Promoci√≥n, Prevenci√≥n y Producci√≥n Social de la Salud, inform√≥ que en el sistema de vigilancia [hay un caso confirmado y un caso sospechoso de tuberculosis](https://www.elpais.com.co/colombia/piden-declarar-emergencia-sanitaria-debido-a-escasez-de-medicamentos-para-la-tuberculosis-1441.html) en dicha estaci√≥n de polic√≠a, sin embargo, no se trata de un brote de esta enfermedad infecciosa.
üö®¬°Atenci√≥n!üö®
‚Äî Secretar√≠a de Salud P√∫blica de Cali (@SaludCali)
Debemos informar que, en este momento no hay brote ni aumento inusitado de casos de tuberculosis u otras enfermedades transmisibles en la estaci√≥n de polic√≠a La Sultana. Actualmente, hay vigilancia activa para garantizar la seguridad de todos.[pic.twitter.com/FiEMQymzVD][December 19, 2024]
‚ÄúAmbos casos est√°n con manejo m√©dico y el caso confirmado actualmente est√° en manejo y tratamiento farmacol√≥gico contra la tuberculosis. Debemos mencionar que en la estaci√≥n actualmente estamos en vigilancia activa y en gesti√≥n de jornadas de salud para garantizar el acceso a los servicios‚Äù, aclar√≥ el especialista.
De igual manera, el funcionario destac√≥ que, tanto la red de estaciones de polic√≠a como otros ‚Äúespacios de hacinamiento‚Äù permanecen bajo vigilancia activa y ‚Äúdebemos reportar que no tenemos un aumento inusitado de tuberculosis, VIH ni de enfermedades prevenibles‚Äù.
El pasado 17 de diciembre, la Personer√≠a Distrital de Cali inform√≥ que hab√≠a visitado la estaci√≥n de polic√≠a La Sultana ‚Äúante el anuncio de un posible brote de tuberculosis y la gravedad del estado de salud del se√±or Juli√°n Cort√©s, persona privada de la libertad quien requiri√≥ atenci√≥n m√©dica‚Äù.
En su momento, el organismo inst√≥ a ‚Äúcontinuar pendientes de la poblaci√≥n privada de la libertad, realizando oportunamente las pruebas de TBC (tuberculosis) y aislando al personal contagiado y suministrando el tratamiento cl√≠nico requerido en un acto de humanismo‚Äù.
Cabe recordar que, en octubre de este a√±o, la Personer√≠a de Cali tambi√©n alert√≥ sobre el eventual riesgo de un brote de tuberculosis en la estaci√≥n de polic√≠a de La Flora, [debido a los √≠ndices de hacinamiento de personas privadas de la libertad.](https://www.elpais.com.co/judicial/la-tuberculosis-en-estaciones-de-policia-de-cali-se-convirtio-en-una-epidemia-autoridades-responden-a-la-denuncia-del-personero-0850.html)
‚ÄúSe realiz√≥ una prueba de tuberculosis mediante ensayo cut√°neo tipo PPD (tuberculina o Mantoux) a 61 [personas privadas de la libertad.](https://www.elpais.com.co/colombia/alarmante-minjusticia-advirtio-que-hay-un-525-de-hacinamiento-en-colombia-en-centros-de-detencion-transitoria-cuantas-personas-se-capturan-al-dia-0823.html) El resultado fue positivo en 41 de los evaluados, lo que representa una preocupante tasa de contagio‚Äù, detall√≥ en su momento el organismo. Y agreg√≥ que, del total de casos, dos personas mostraron signos de tuberculosis activa con alteraciones en radiograf√≠as.

author: www.ETHRWorld.com
title: Nomura is sued by former researcher over alleged gender bias, HRME News, ETHRWorldME
text: FILE PHOTO: The logo of Nomura Securities is seen near the company's Head Office in Tokyo, Japan, November 28, 2016. REUTERS/Toru Hanai/File PhotoNEW YORK - Nomura Securities was sued in New York by a former quantitative researcher who said she was underpaid relative to men and fired after insisting that her team \"should stop discriminating against women.\" Xue Feng filed her lawsuit on Monday in federal court in Manhattan, seeking unspecified damages for alleged violations of federal civil rights, equal pay and medical leave laws, and New York state and city human rights laws. Nomura had no immediate comment on Tuesday. Feng, who is known Heidi, said she had worked in Nomura's otherwise all-male Global Equities Digital Office, which she joined in August 2020 as an associate quantitative researcher after holding a similar job at JPMorgan Chase. The Manhattan resident said her former boss once acknowledged that she was \"underpaid\" relative to men. She also said Nomura gave her an unfair performance review and began ignoring her after concluding that her medical tests for possible cancer kept her out of the office too often. Feng said she was fired last July 29, ostensibly in a reorganization, after she mentioned discrimination in an internal survey about the workplace, and gave negative feedback about two managers. No one else lost their jobs, she said. Many banks have taken steps to make their workplaces more inclusive. Nomura's parent Nomura Holdings pledges on its website not to tolerate gender discrimination in employment. In a 2022 report cited in the complaint, Nomura acknowledged paying men more than women in other parts of the world, but said it had made progress in closing the pay gap. Feng's lawyer Brendan Sweeney said his client's case could show similar disparities in the United States. \"Nomura had different rules for men and women,\" Sweeney said. \"The only person impacted by its reorganization was the only woman, who had complained about discrimination.\" The case is Feng v. Nomura Securities International Inc, U.S. District Court, Southern District of New York, No. 24-00467. (Reporting by Jonathan Stempel in New York; editing by Jonathan Oatis)

author: GB Times
title: Did aunt penny ºs go out of business?
text:
Did Aunt Penny‚Äôs Go Out of Business?
Aunt Penny‚Äôs was a beloved bakery and caf√© in the heart of downtown Toronto, known for its delicious treats and warm atmosphere. However, in 2020, the bakery suddenly closed its doors, leaving customers and employees alike wondering what had happened. In this article, we‚Äôll delve into the reasons behind Aunt Penny‚Äôs demise and explore the impact it had on the community.
What Happened to Aunt Penny‚Äôs?
Aunt Penny‚Äôs was a family-owned business that had been operating for over 20 years. The bakery was famous for its mouthwatering pastries, cakes, and cookies, as well as its cozy atmosphere and friendly staff. However, in 2020, the bakery‚Äôs owners announced that they would be closing the business due to financial difficulties .
Financial Difficulties: The Primary Reason
According to sources close to the business, Aunt Penny‚Äôs was struggling to stay afloat due to increasing rent costs . The bakery‚Äôs lease had expired, and the new rent demanded by the landlord was exorbitant . The owners were forced to consider closing the business rather than paying the higher rent.
Other Factors Contributing to the Closure
While financial difficulties were the primary reason for the closure, other factors also played a role. Competition from big-box stores and online bakeries had increased, making it harder for Aunt Penny‚Äôs to compete. Additionally, the bakery‚Äôs aging equipment and outdated technology made it difficult to keep up with the demands of modern customers.
Impact on the Community
The closure of Aunt Penny‚Äôs had a significant impact on the community. Loyal customers were devastated by the news, and many took to social media to express their sadness and disappointment. Local businesses also felt the effects, as Aunt Penny‚Äôs was a popular spot for tourists and locals alike.
Table: Aunt Penny‚Äôs Closure Statistics
Category
Statistics
Number of Employees
20

50
Annual Revenue
$500,000
Rent Increase
30%
Employee Impact
The closure of Aunt Penny‚Äôs also had a significant impact on its employees. 20 employees were left without jobs, and many were forced to seek employment elsewhere. The bakery‚Äôs owners worked hard to find new jobs for their employees, but it was a difficult process.
Customer Reaction
The closure of Aunt Penny‚Äôs sparked a wave of nostalgia among customers. Many took to social media to share their favorite memories of the bakery and express their sadness at its closure. Online petitions were started to try and save the bakery, but ultimately, the decision to close was made.
Conclusion
The closure of Aunt Penny‚Äôs was a significant loss for the community. The bakery‚Äôs warm atmosphere and delicious treats will be deeply missed. While financial difficulties were the primary reason for the closure, other factors such as competition and outdated technology also played a role. The impact on employees and customers was significant, and the closure serves as a reminder of the importance of adapting to changing times.
What Can Be Learned from Aunt Penny‚Äôs Closure?
Adapt to changing times : Businesses must be willing to adapt to changing consumer habits and technologies.
Keep up with competition : Competition from big-box stores and online bakeries can be fierce, and businesses must find ways to compete.
Prioritize employee welfare : The closure of Aunt Penny‚Äôs had a significant impact on its employees, and businesses must prioritize their welfare.
In conclusion, the closure of Aunt Penny‚Äôs was a significant loss for the community. While financial difficulties were the primary reason for the closure, other factors also played a role. The impact on employees and customers was significant, and the closure serves as a reminder of the importance of adapting to changing times.

author: French Presstv
title: Le Hamas reste ferme sur sa volont√© de parvenir √† un accord qui garantirait la fin de la guerre
text: Le chef du bureau politique du Hamas, Isma√Øl Haniyeh, a soulign√© l‚Äôengagement s√©rieux de la R√©sistance palestinienne aux pourparlers de cessez-le-feu, mettant en avant la volont√© in√©branlable du mouvement de parvenir √† un accord et √† la lib√©ration des prisonniers. Haniyeh a fait savoir que la priorit√© absolue du Hamas est de mettre fin √† l‚Äôagression perp√©tr√©e √† l‚Äôencontre de la population de Gaza, ce qui selon lui contribuerait √† cr√©er de la stabilit√© et de la prosp√©rit√© pour la nation palestinienne. Isma√Øl Haniyeh a indiqu√© que le monde √©tait actuellement sous l‚Äôemprise d‚Äôun r√©gime extr√©miste, coupable pour de nombreux crimes √† Gaza. Il a √©galement d√©clar√© que le Premier ministre de ce r√©gime essayait de trouver des excuses pour perp√©trer l‚Äôagression, intensifier le conflit et an√©antir les initiatives de m√©diation entreprises par diverses parties. Haniyeh a recommand√© aux √âtats-Unis d‚Äôemp√™cher Isra√´l de perp√©trer plus de crimes au lieu de lui livrer plus d‚Äôarmes de destruction massive. Le chef du bureau politique du Hamas a mis en exergue le d√©sir du mouvement Hamas de parvenir √† un accord global, en suivant une s√©rie d‚Äô√©tapes successives qui mettraient un terme √† l‚Äôagression, assureraient un retrait s√©curis√© et aboutiraient √† un accord d‚Äô√©change de prisonniers. Lors d‚Äôune r√©union du cabinet isra√©lien qui s‚Äôest tenue dimanche 5 mai, le Premier ministre du r√©gime sioniste, Benjamin Netanyahu, a exprim√© son refus cat√©gorique des conditions avanc√©es par le Hamas. Il a affirm√© que ces conditions √©taient inacceptables et ne sauraient √™tre tol√©r√©es par d‚ÄôIsra√´l. Un haut dirigeant du Hamas a exprim√© au journal Al-Araby Al-Jadeed (The New Arab) que le Hamas ne consentirait √† aucun accord tant que la guerre ne prendrait pas fin et que les forces isra√©liennes ne se retireraient pas compl√®tement de la bande de Gaza. ¬´ Nous ne pouvons en aucun cas acc√©der √† la demande du Hamas pour un arr√™t total de la guerre et un retrait de Gaza. Si nous c√©dons √† cette exigence, cela reviendrait √† reconna√Ætre leur autorit√© et leur pouvoir √† Gaza ¬ª, a affirm√© Netanyahu. L‚Äôagence Reuters a r√©v√©l√© que les hauts responsables du Hamas ont particip√©, dimanche 5 mai, √† une deuxi√®me journ√©e de n√©gociations de cessez-le-feu avec les m√©diateurs √©gyptiens et qataris sans pourtant aucun signe de progr√®s, que et le mouvement a maintenu sa position selon laquelle tout accord doit mettre un terme √† la guerre √† Gaza.

author: Rita Nazareth
title: AI Obsession Powers $7 Trillion Nasdaq 100 Rally
text:
A banner year for stocks is drawing to a close, with gains in big tech leaving the market near all-time highs amid the artificial-intelligence exuberance and dovish Federal Reserve bets.
On the eve of Wall Street‚Äôs final closing bell of 2023, the Nasdaq 100 marched toward its best year since 1999 after a $7 trillion surge. The S&P 500 approached a record ‚Äî and is roughly 1% below the average full-year gain predicted in a recent survey with analysts, who forecast the index would end 2024 at 4,833.
‚ÄúIf the stock market can break through that record high in any significant way as we move through January, it‚Äôs going to be very bullish on a technical basis,‚Äù said Matt Maley at Miller Tabak + Co. ‚ÄúWhenever the market is rallying strongly at the beginning of a new year ‚Äî when a lot of people are adjusting their investment-game plans ‚Äî it tends to exacerbate the rally.‚Äù
In a rates-obsessed world, the stock market saw a massive reversal this year after suffering its worst annual selloff since 2008. As traders ramped up bets the Fed is done with its hiking campaign ‚Äî and will start easing policy in 2024 ‚Äî global bonds are set for their biggest two-month gain on record.
The S&P 500 traded just a few points away from its all-time high of 4,796.56 ‚Äî extending its 2023 advance to 25%. Treasuries dropped after a weak $40 billion sale of seven-year notes. The dollar rose against most of its developed-market peers. The yen climbed as Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda continued to prepare the ground for the nation‚Äôs first rate increase since 2007.
From Nvidia Corp. to Microsoft Corp., the seven largest US tech stocks were responsible for 64% of the gauge‚Äôs rally this year through last week as the AI frenzy took off. The Nasdaq 100 is up 55% this year.
The ‚ÄòMagnificent Seven‚Äô ‚Äî which also includes Amazon.com Inc., Apple Inc., Google parent Alphabet Inc., Meta Platforms Inc. and Tesla Inc. ‚Äî are expected to post 22% earnings growth next year, twice the S&P 500‚Äôs advance, data compiled by Bloomberg Intelligence show. The key is how much of that is already baked into share prices, especially with expectations for a soft landing building.
‚ÄúCompanies that have a defined and clear AI strategy with easy-to-follow metrics will likely continue to do well in 2024,‚Äù said Michael Landsberg at Landsberg Bennett Private Wealth Management. ‚ÄúCompanies that have a hard time explaining their AI value proposition will not see a repeat of 2023, where most large tech was buoyed by the excitement and not necessarily the details of AI.‚Äù
Investors have flocked to big tech in part on bets that they are best positioned to capitalize on AI due to their vast scale and financial strength.
Those bigger profits have brought valuations down from nosebleed levels ‚Äî but they‚Äôre still lofty. The Nasdaq 100 is priced at about 25 times profits projected over the next 12 months, according to data compiled by Bloomberg. While that‚Äôs down from a peak of 30 in 2020, it‚Äôs well above the average of 19 times over the past two decades.
Although there has been a relatively high number of stocks with gains of over 100%, there haven‚Äôt been many outperforming the S&P 500, Bespoke Investment Group noted. In a typical year, on average, 48.7% of the benchmark‚Äôs members post larger gains than the index itself. In 2023, less than 30% of its members are outpacing the index.

author: EFE
title: Mbapp√© est√° "muy contento" en Madrid: "He marcado goles, todo va bien" - ESPN
text: [Kylian Mbapp√©](/futbol/jugador/_/id/231388/kylian-mbappe) se mostr√≥ "muy contento" este jueves del tiempo que lleva en el [Real Madrid](/futbol/equipo/_/id/86/real-madrid), ya que en ese corto periodo el equipo logr√≥ la Supercopa de Europa, √©l ha marcado ya varios goles y "todo va bien". "Estoy muy contento de estar en Madrid, todo va bien. Hemos ganado ya un trofeo. Cada vez va mejor. He marcado goles, todo va bien", destac√≥ la estrella francesa en una rueda de prensa de la selecci√≥n francesa previa al [partido de la Liga de las Naciones que va a disputar este viernes frente a Italia en Par√≠s](/futbol/mundial/nota/_/id/14123946/francia-vs-italia-por-la-nations-league-equipo-fecha-hora-y-tv-en-vivo). El encuentro se disputar√° en el Parque de los Pr√≠ncipes, la que fue su casa deportiva durante sus siete a√±os en el Par√≠s Saint Germain (PSG), ya que el Estadio de Francia est√° ocupado por los Juegos Paral√≠mpicos. El atacante estrella y capit√°n de [Francia](/futbol/equipo/_/id/478/francia) dijo que estaba encantado de volver a Par√≠s y al estadio de su antiguo club, y asegur√≥ que no le preocupa la acogida que pueda tener por parte de los aficionados. Volver al Parque de los Pr√≠ncipes "es algo especial. He pasado muchos a√±os aqu√≠", se√±al√≥. "Sobre la acogida, no espero gran cosa, me da igual. Lo importante es ganar", afirm√≥. Preguntado por su conflicto salarial con el [PSG](/futbol/equipo/_/id/160/paris-saint-germain), al que le reclama el pago de 55 millones de euros, el jugador respondi√≥ de forma elusiva: "Solo tengo buenos recuerdos del PSG. Le deseo lo mejor". Mbapp√© se√±al√≥ que se encuentra bien tras la experiencia de la Eurocopa, competici√≥n que jug√≥ en condiciones particulares al romperse la nariz en el primer partido frente a Austria. Explic√≥ que fue sometido a varios ex√°menes, que mostraron que no era necesario operarse. "F√≠sica y mentalmente estoy bien", repiti√≥. El delantero rechaz√≥ entrar en debates sobre cu√°l es su posici√≥n ideal en el terreno de juego. "Puedo jugar en los tres puestos de delante, no cambia gran cosa", recalc√≥. Preguntado por las cr√≠ticas al juego de la Francia durante la Eurocopa, el delantero estrella de la selecci√≥n y del Real Madrid explic√≥ que los jugadores "intentamos dar lo mejor", aunque "no se puede contentar a todo el mundo". El encuentro de ma√±ana contra Italia forma parte de la primera jornada de la fase de grupos de la nueva edici√≥n de la Liga de las Naciones. A pesar de que ambos equipos no jugaron bien en la Eurocopa, se mostr√≥ convencido de que "ser√° un gran partido" porque no deja de ser un Francia-Italia". "Hay que prepararse para ver la mejor versi√≥n de Italia", concluy√≥.
